properties.name: flavorData
properties.description:
For the uDRM we give the drm context data which is a json encoding of an array containing the uDRM data
     for each flavor that is required from this getContextData request.

properties.name: publicCertificate
properties.description:
For fairplay (and maybe in the future other drm providers) we need to return a public certificate to encrypt
	 the request from the player to the server.
